name: Edge of Intent
flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of cunning.

name: Dragon's Breath
flavorText: Burn the world. Burn it all.

name: Prometheus Lens
flavorText: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6

name: Dead Messenger
flavorText: A gift for the empress who has everything.

name: Osteo Striga
flavorText: "Victory is not in the unmaking of an enemy, but in the re-making of an enemy into your blade." —9th Understanding, 7th Revision of Sorrow

name: Malfeasance
flavorText: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter

name: The Manticore
flavorText: Let fly my sting.

name: Finality's Auger
flavorText: Write the future into the present.

name: Ace of Spades
flavorText: "Folding was never an option." —Cayde-6

name: Salvation's Grip
flavorText: "I respect what I cannot steal from and you cannot take from the dark." —Excerpt from an old Eliksni salvage manifest

name: Delicate Tomb
flavorText: The danger within is repulsive to us.

name: Outbreak Perfected
flavorText: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~

name: Jötunn
flavorText: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1

name: Red Death Reformed
flavorText: Vanguard policy still urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.

name: Deterministic Chaos
flavorText: "So all being is a one and only being; and that it continues to be when someone dies, tells you, that he did not cease to be." —Schrodinger's epitaph

name: Edge of Concurrence
flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of ambition.

name: Cryosthesia 77K
flavorText: There are things colder than cold.

name: Tommy's Matchbook
flavorText: "It's warm in here."

name: Wish-Ender
flavorText: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

name: Trinity Ghoul
flavorText: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

name: Wicked Implement
flavorText: YOU, A CHAMPION OF WAR, STANDARD-BEARER OF VIOLENCE, LET YOUR MARCH BE ENDLESS.

name: Necrochasm
flavorText: Is your Light bright enough to stand in full gaze of the Hive's abyss?

name: Slayer's Fang
flavorText: Fear neither dreams nor teeth.

name: Ice Breaker
flavorText: Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage: HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR.

name: Truth
flavorText: "…is where you seek it." —Lomar

name: Trespasser
flavorText: "You are not welcome."

name: MIDA Multi-Tool
flavorText: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

name: Sweet Business
flavorText: "…I love my job."

name: Coldheart
flavorText: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.

name: Ruinous Effigy
flavorText: From the many wings of ruin blows a wind that will reshape this dead world.

name: Gjallarhorn
flavorText: “If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?” — Feizel Crux

name: The Last Word
flavorText: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown

name: Xenophage
flavorText: This might sting a little.

name: The Navigator
flavorText: I dive to understand.

name: Revision Zero
flavorText: The first of many.

name: Barrow-Dyad
flavorText: Lay those unquiet thoughts to rest.

name: The Wardcliff Coil
flavorText: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

name: Cerberus+1
flavorText: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

name: No Time to Explain
flavorText: A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.

name: The Fourth Horseman
flavorText: It's not a holdout weapon; it's a pathfinder.

name: Ergo Sum
flavorText: Silent. Silent. Silent.

name: Legend of Acrius
flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

name: Grand Overture
flavorText: It's not over until the vast red artificial intelligence sings.

name: Touch of Malice
flavorText: "Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." —Eris Morn

name: Ager's Scepter
flavorText: "One day, you will mold the world to your liking, dear brother, as I always have." —Queen Mara Sov

name: Wavesplitter
flavorText: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.

name: Traveler's Chosen
flavorText: "All we have left now is our faith."

name: Worldline Zero
flavorText: A single strike can alter the course of history.

name: Whisper of the Worm
flavorText: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

name: Centrifuse
flavorText: Breakthrough, or broken?

name: Whisper of the Worm
flavorText: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

name: The Queenbreaker
flavorText: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

name: One Thousand Voices
flavorText: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.

name: Heir Apparent
flavorText: "The Red Legion will march again." —Caiatl

name: Arbalest
flavorText: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

name: Forerunner
flavorText: A new chapter for an old legend.

name: Dead Man's Tale
flavorText: "Long, short, they all end the same way." —Katabasis

name: Telesto
flavorText: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

name: Deathbringer
flavorText: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."

name: The Huckleberry
flavorText: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

name: Alethonym
flavorText: I know your name.

name: Witherhoard
flavorText: "Like a one-man private security company." —The Drifter

name: Rat King
flavorText: We are small, but we are legion.

name: Anarchy
flavorText: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

name: Eyes of Tomorrow
flavorText: "I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." —Clovis Bray

name: Bastion
flavorText: "The final stand is wherever I plant my feet. Not one step more." —Saint-14

name: Edge of Action
flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of strength.

name: New Land Beyond
flavorText: Every hit blazes the path to our reclamation.

name: Leviathan's Breath
flavorText: "Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." —Emperor Calus

name: Cloudstrike
flavorText: They return to moons devoid. Their eyes searching. It's just begun. Meet this storm of sound and fury, till thunder-clashes fade to silence.

name: Two-Tailed Fox
flavorText: Adorably murderous.

name: Parasite
flavorText: "Constant projections. Unending destruction. The will of every efficient parasite." —Savathûn's worm

name: Dead Messenger
flavorText: A gift for the empress who has everything.

name: Bad Juju
flavorText: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland the Shattered

name: SUROS Regime
flavorText: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

name: Still Hunt
flavorText: There are too many ways to kill someone who needs killing.

name: Sturm
flavorText: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

name: Sunshot
flavorText: "Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng

name: Wish-Keeper
flavorText: "Live." —Taranis Rivensmate

name: Riskrunner
flavorText: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.

name: Tarrabah
flavorText: We walk where our ancestors once walked.

name: Winterbite
flavorText: Don't slip or you'll hurt yourself. A lot.

name: Vexcalibur
flavorText: And they came to a lake fair and broad. "Lo," said the voice, "yonder is the blade that I spoke of."

name: Final Warning
flavorText: The flit of tiny wings; the pull of a trigger.

name: D.A.R.C.I.
flavorText: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

name: Borealis
flavorText: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

name: Izanagi's Burden
flavorText: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1

name: Ticuu's Divination
flavorText: Three points, pushed through forever.

name: Euphony
flavorText: Perhaps The Final Shape is not silence, it is a symphony.

name: Thunderlord
flavorText: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

name: Conditional Finality
flavorText: You will dream of me… I will never leave you…

name: Polaris Lance
flavorText: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray

name: The Chaperone
flavorText: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

name: Lord of Wolves
flavorText: By this right alone do I rule.

name: Crimson
flavorText: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

name: Duality
flavorText: "The question becomes whether or not to fire, not where to aim." —Osiris

name: The Lament
flavorText: The last thing the Vex ever heard—the grinding wails of a vicious Banshee.

name: Collective Obligation
flavorText: "What The Witness gave me, I give to you. May it serve you in death, or in finality. It cannot be both." —Rhulk, disciple of the Witness

name: Lumina
flavorText: There must be meaning in my roar.

name: Eriana's Vow
flavorText: A light in the dark.

name: Fighting Lion
flavorText: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

name: The Prospector
flavorText: "Some things should stay buried."

name: Tessellation
flavorText: The monolith is hewn; the monument is built.

name: Legend of Acrius
flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

name: Tractor Cannon
flavorText: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

name: Le Monarque
flavorText: "Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." —Ada-1

name: Graviton Lance
flavorText: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

name: Vigilance Wing
flavorText: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

name: Dead Man's Tale
flavorText: "Long, short, they all end the same way." —Katabasis

name: Verglas Curve
flavorText: A volley of solutions to any disruption.

name: Heartshadow
flavorText: Suffering to the conquered.

name: Choir of One
flavorText: A voice. A choice. An invitation.

name: Lodestar
flavorText: Potentia ex nihilo.

name: Lorentz Driver
flavorText: "Weapon system no longer explodes when trigger is pulled." —Prototype 7.2.1 Revision Notes

name: Black Talon
flavorText: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

name: Ex Diris
flavorText: "I have heralded disaster so often that my mere presence is an omen. So be it." —Eris Morn

name: Devil's Ruin
flavorText: "Press on! The Devils will rue the day they came to our doors!" —Lord Shaxx

name: Outbreak Perfected
flavorText: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~

name: The Jade Rabbit
flavorText: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

name: Hawkmoon
flavorText: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

name: Buried Bloodline
flavorText: Shallow graves give way to old vendettas and hungry claims.

name: The Colony
flavorText: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

name: Thorn
flavorText: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

name: Symmetry
flavorText: "Duality is not a curse, but a gift." —Author unknown

name: Sleeper Simulant
flavorText: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

name: Monte Carlo
flavorText: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

name: Divinity
flavorText: Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.

name: Hard Light
flavorText: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

name: Khvostov 7G-0X
flavorText: "You don't know how long I've been looking for you."

name: Hierarchy of Needs
flavorText: "I have peered through the eye of Chronos to divine humanity's path into the future." —Soteria, the Augurmind

name: Merciless
flavorText: Entropy is inevitable.

name: Microcosm
flavorText: We all owe our existence to one singular moment, long ago.

name: Skyburner's Oath
flavorText: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Inexorable victory."

name: Vex Mythoclast
flavorText: …a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…

name: Quicksilver Storm
flavorText: Three words. Carved by hand: Affinity. Altruism. Awareness.
